show.title: The Victorious Attitude
show.description: üèÜ Life-la adhigama achieve panna aasaiya? "The Victorious Attitude" ungaloda normal mindset -ta epdi success- mindset ta matharadhu-nu kathu kodukkudhu. üåü vetri adairadhukkaana habits-a build panni, thadaigala thaandi positive attitude-oda overcome panradhu epdi nu therinjukalaam vaanga. üìñ  üîä
